QuestData.Title: The Caged Bird
QuestData.Description:
Remain quiet. We must not attract attention.
Many of my sisters have already been lost. It will soon be my turn to perish in that witch's vile ritual.
Release me from this cage and I can see us both to safety. Keeper Odyn must be warned of this foul betrayal!
The Mawsworn called Kjellrun holds the seal that can free me. You can find her gloating in the nearby hall.
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire the Helwrought Seal from Kjellrun and release Danica from her captivity.
QuestData.RewardText: I will tell the tale of your noble deeds, $n. Your actions this day will be remembered.
